Description: Turquoise pendant: flat-sided and drop-shaped, with a hole for suspension in the narrower section.
Curator's comments: From the site of the Predynastic village, according to British Museum Departmental records. From the excavations of H. Frankfort, see 'Journal of Egyptian Archaeology' 16 (1930), 213ff.
Bibliographic references: Andrews 1981 / Catalogue of Egyptian Antiquities. Jewellery I (140)
